How a master thief relies on uneven grou: A master thief relies on inaccessible riverlands or rugged mountains
How a master thief relies on thick cover: A master thief relies on thick grass, thick trees, a ridge, or a large dense wood
How a master thief relies on powerful in: A master thief relies on rulers or their ministers
They think: ‘If anyone accuses me of anything, these rulers or their ministers will speak in my defense in the case.’
How a bad mendicant relies on uneven gro: A bad mendicant has unethical conduct by way of body, speech, and mind
How a bad mendicant relies on thick cove: A bad mendicant has wrong view
He’s attached to an extremist view
